messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: AS acting captain i have come the desicion that spics are banned

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a number of [REDACTED] have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.
